fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Public Health
eu_initiatives: Reproductive health, family policies, violence against women, gender equality and social rights, violence against women, children rights, human trafficking, rights of disabled people, end of life issues, active ageing, intergenerational solidarity, palliative care development,  suicide prevention, medical research.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Training on bioethics, brochures and manuals, numerous publications in conjonction with above topics.
goals__remit: Alliance VITA is a non gouvernmental and non profit organization based in Paris and Brussels, focused on bioethics issues, human dignity and fundamental rights.
